ingenico_gateway-response-400530: Error message for invalid payment method, for example, not a valid credit card type.
ingenico_gateway-response-430306: Error message for expired credit card.
ingenico_gateway-response-430330: Error message for invalid card number.
ingenico_gateway-response-430421: Error message for declined credit card transaction. This error may be due to incorrect information being entered into the form.
ingenico_gateway-response-430360: Error message for declined credit card transaction due to insuffient funds.
ingenico_gateway-response-430285: Error message for declined credit card transaction due to "do not honor" message from payment provider.
ingenico_gateway-response-21000150: Error message for invalid bank account number.
ingenico_gateway-response-21000155: Error message for invalid bank code.
ingenico_gateway-response-21000160: Error message for invalid giro account number.
ingenico_gateway-response-default: Error message if something went wrong on our side.
